value.title: CoreStory, whose AI platform automates generating documentation for legacy code bases, raised a $32M Series A led by Tribeca, NEA, and SineWave (Maria Deutscher/SiliconANGLE)
value.content:
Maria Deutscher / SiliconANGLE:
CoreStory, whose AI platform automates generating documentation for legacy code bases, raised a $32M Series A led by Tribeca, NEA, and SineWave  —  Artificial intelligence startup CoreStory Inc. today announced that it has closed a $32 million funding early-stage round led by Tribeca Venture Partners, NEA and SineWave Ventures.

value.title: Samsung reports Q3 revenue up 8.85% YoY to ~$60.5B, vs. ~$60.4B est., and operating profit up 32.9% YoY to ~$8.57B, vs. ~$7.9B est., more than doubling from Q2 (Dylan Butts/CNBC)
value.content:
Dylan Butts / CNBC:
Samsung reports Q3 revenue up 8.85% YoY to ~$60.5B, vs. ~$60.4B est., and operating profit up 32.9% YoY to ~$8.57B, vs. ~$7.9B est., more than doubling from Q2  —  Samsung Electronics reported a rebound in earnings on Thursday, with operating profit more than doubling from the previous quarter on a rebound in its chip business.

value.title: Sources: Consensys, maker of crypto wallet MetaMask, plans to go public, with JPMorgan and Goldman Sachs leading its IPO; Consensys was valued at $7B in 2022 (Lucinda Shen/Axios)
value.content:
Lucinda Shen / Axios:
Sources: Consensys, maker of crypto wallet MetaMask, plans to go public, with JPMorgan and Goldman Sachs leading its IPO; Consensys was valued at $7B in 2022  —  Crypto company Consensys has picked JPMorgan and Goldman Sachs to lead its IPO, Axios Pro has learned.

value.title: Sources: OpenAI is preparing for an IPO that could value it at ~$1T and has looked at raising $60B+, filing as soon as H2 2026 and listing in 2027 (Reuters)
value.content:
Reuters:
Sources: OpenAI is preparing for an IPO that could value it at ~$1T and has looked at raising $60B+, filing as soon as H2 2026 and listing in 2027  —  OpenAI is laying the groundwork for an initial public offering that could value the company at up to around $1 trillion …

value.title: Crypto media company Blockworks is closing its newsroom, launched in 2021, and will focus on software and data, continuing its main newsletters and podcasts (Pooja Rajkumari/TheStreet)
value.content:
Pooja Rajkumari / TheStreet:
Crypto media company Blockworks is closing its newsroom, launched in 2021, and will focus on software and data, continuing its main newsletters and podcasts  —  Founded in 2017, the crypto media outlet says the move marks the next phase of its growth.  —  Blockworks, a leading crypto media company …

value.title: Microsoft reports Q1 gaming revenue down 2% YoY to $5.51B, Xbox hardware revenue down 29%, and Xbox content and services revenue up 1% (Jennifer Maas/Variety)
value.content:
Jennifer Maas / Variety:
Microsoft reports Q1 gaming revenue down 2% YoY to $5.51B, Xbox hardware revenue down 29%, and Xbox content and services revenue up 1%  —  Microsoft reported its latest quarterly earnings results Wednesday, revealing that gaming revenue decreased $113 million (2%).

value.title: Mark Zuckerberg says Threads has 150M DAUs, up from 100M+ in December 2024, and Meta has rolled out ads globally in the Threads feed with plans to add video ads (Karissa Bell/Engadget)
value.content:
Karissa Bell / Engadget:
Mark Zuckerberg says Threads has 150M DAUs, up from 100M+ in December 2024, and Meta has rolled out ads globally in the Threads feed with plans to add video ads  —  Ads in the Threads feed have rolled out globally and video ads are on the way.  —  Threads has grown to 150 million daily active users.

value.title: Microsoft reports Q1 Azure and other cloud services revenue up 40% YoY, vs. 38.4% est., and capital expenditures at $34.9B, vs. $30.34B est. (Reuters)
value.content:
Reuters:
Microsoft reports Q1 Azure and other cloud services revenue up 40% YoY, vs. 38.4% est., and capital expenditures at $34.9B, vs. $30.34B est.  —  Microsoft reported blockbuster growth in its cloud-computing business on Wednesday that pushed its quarterly revenue past Wall Street estimates …

value.title: Sources: Mastercard is in late-stage talks to acquire the crypto and stablecoin infrastructure startup Zerohash for between $1.5B and $2B (Fortune)
value.content:
Fortune:
Sources: Mastercard is in late-stage talks to acquire the crypto and stablecoin infrastructure startup Zerohash for between $1.5B and $2B  —  Mastercard's stock has moved in response to reports of stablecoin interest from banks and large merchants like Amazon and Walmart.

value.title: Microsoft's OpenAI investment resulted in a $3.1B hit to Q1 net income; Productivity and Business Processes revenue, with Office and LinkedIn, grew 17% to $33B (Ashley Capoot/CNBC)
value.content:
Ashley Capoot / CNBC:
Microsoft's OpenAI investment resulted in a $3.1B hit to Q1 net income; Productivity and Business Processes revenue, with Office and LinkedIn, grew 17% to $33B  —  Microsoft reported better-than-expected results for its fiscal first quarter as revenue in the company's Azure cloud business jumped 40%.

value.title: eBay reports Q3 revenue up 9% YoY to $2.82B, vs. $2.73B est., GMV up 10% to $20.1B, and forecasts Q4 profit below estimates; EBAY drops 6%+ after hours (Spencer Soper/Bloomberg)
value.content:
Spencer Soper / Bloomberg:
eBay reports Q3 revenue up 9% YoY to $2.82B, vs. $2.73B est., GMV up 10% to $20.1B, and forecasts Q4 profit below estimates; EBAY drops 6%+ after hours  —  EBay Inc. gave a profit forecast for the fourth quarter that missed the average analyst estimate, stoking investor concerns …

value.title: Alphabet reports Google Cloud Q3 revenue of $15.15B vs. $14.74B est., and raises 2025 capex forecast to $91B-$93B, after projecting $85B in July (Jennifer Elias/CNBC)
value.content:
Jennifer Elias / CNBC:
Alphabet reports Google Cloud Q3 revenue of $15.15B vs. $14.74B est., and raises 2025 capex forecast to $91B-$93B, after projecting $85B in July  —  Alphabet reported third-quarter earnings that beat analyst expectations.  Shares rose 4% in after-hours trading.

value.title: Sources: YouTube reorganizes its leadership team, with three product teams reporting to CEO Neal Mohan, and announces a "voluntary exit program" for US staff (Alex Heath/Sources)
value.content:
Alex Heath / Sources:
Sources: YouTube reorganizes its leadership team, with three product teams reporting to CEO Neal Mohan, and announces a “voluntary exit program” for US staff  —  Neal Mohan's internal memo about YouTube's “next frontier” and opt-in layoffs.  —  ∙ Paid

value.title: Meta reports Reality Labs Q3 revenue of $470M vs. $316M est., and a $4.4B operating loss vs. $5.1B est.; Reality Labs has lost $70B+ since 2020 (Jonathan Vanian/CNBC)
value.content:
Jonathan Vanian / CNBC:
Meta reports Reality Labs Q3 revenue of $470M vs. $316M est., and a $4.4B operating loss vs. $5.1B est.; Reality Labs has lost $70B+ since 2020  —  Meta continues to sink money into the metaverse, anchored by virtual reality and augmented reality technologies.

value.title: Meta recorded a one-time income tax charge of $15.93B related to Trump's Big Beautiful Bill and expects 2025 capex of $70B-$72B, up from a $66B-$72B forecast (Jaspreet Singh/Reuters)
value.content:
Jaspreet Singh / Reuters:
Meta recorded a one-time income tax charge of $15.93B related to Trump's Big Beautiful Bill and expects 2025 capex of $70B-$72B, up from a $66B-$72B forecast  —  Meta (META.O) recorded a nearly $16 billion one-time charge in the third quarter related to U.S. President Donald Trump's Big Beautiful Bill …
